# bugsafe

> Safe-to-share crash bundles for humans and LLMs

bugsafe captures Python crashes and creates redacted, shareable bug reports.
It automatically removes API keys, tokens, passwords, and other secrets while
preserving the information needed to debug issues.

## Documentation

Full documentation: https://matbmeijer.github.io/bugsafe/

Each page has a "Copy to LLM" button for easy Markdown export.

## Quick Links

- Getting Started: https://matbmeijer.github.io/bugsafe/getting-started/installation/
- CLI Reference: https://matbmeijer.github.io/bugsafe/reference/cli/
- API Reference: https://matbmeijer.github.io/bugsafe/reference/api/redact/
- Redaction Patterns: https://matbmeijer.github.io/bugsafe/reference/patterns/

## Installation

```bash
pip install bugsafe
```

## Basic Usage

```bash
# Capture a crash
bugsafe run -- python my_script.py

# Render for sharing
bugsafe render crash.bugbundle

# Optimized for LLMs
bugsafe render crash.bugbundle --llm
```

## Source Code

GitHub: https://github.com/matbmeijer/bugsafe
PyPI: https://pypi.org/project/bugsafe/
